name: Birdwar
description:
How to play?

Use the A and D keys to move, and the mouse to shoot / attack.
Reset the game with R and use ESC to return to the main menu.

How does it work?

Enemies appear left and right and your mission is to kill 'em with the weapons you get every 10 seconds.

How do you change difficulty?

You can change your difficulty by changing the "daytime" in the main menu.
(Day = standart / Afternoon = hard / Night = harder)
